tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drone_inventory (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_name VARCHAR(255),
	item_type VARCHAR(50),
	quantity INT,
	location VARCHAR(100),
	last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_spare_parts (
    relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    part_id INT,
    quantity_needed INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES spare_parts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SpareParts (
    part_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    part_type TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    supplier TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    inventory_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID NOT NULL,
    part_id UUID NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    entry_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(drone_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES SpareParts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    technician TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(drone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Drone_Inventory (
	inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drone_id INT,
	part_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(drone_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES Spare_Parts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drone_id INT,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(drone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Repair_Schedule (
	schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drone_id INT,
	repair_date DATE,
	repair_type VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(drone_id)
);
